 Mustex became incredibly angry at his desire to attack the 
defenceless bot.
Mustex:You monster. I won't let you win.
Megaton:Like you have any choice.
Mustex:I WON'T LET YOU WIN!
 Music from the dragonball z movie "Bardock the Father of Goku" from 
just after Bardocks crew died starts playing(ha ha ha) and Mustex 
furiously charges at Megaton.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> Megaton:I'm Megaton. Learn it well because if you don't get out of 
my 
> way it will be the sound of your doom. That kid has to much 
potential 
> I won't lose my spot as the most powerful bot in the universe.
>  They continued dueling. Mustex was stronger than in the future,but 
> not as experienced so Megaton had the advantage.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> >  Mustex didn't know who this guy was and he didn't care. He 
grabbed 
> > the new bot he had dubbed Stallex and jumped out of the way. He 
> drew 
> > his bow.
> > Mustex:Sword mode.
> > It straighten into his double-bladded sword and he charged. The 
> > creature spat out a sword made of ice, transformed to his 
freakish 
> > robot mode, and met him head-on.
> > Musex:Who are you?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> > >  He realized Mustex didn't come out of either pod and must have 
> > been 
> > > online for sometime. One of the protoforms must have gone 
> offline. 
> > > Then he saw the Maximal insignia on Mustex and knew he had lost 
> the 
> > > protoform. Worse yet the new bot looked like a BABY, it had to 
be 
> > > weak now, but it could be a formidable opponent in the future 
if 
> it 
> > > went through the same gradual upgrades as humans. He wouldn't 
> allow 
> > > it to happen. HE was the maost powerful bot in the universe, 
and 
> it 
> > > would stay that way. He transformed to dragon mode and spit 
fire 
> at 
> > > the 2 bots...
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > > > OOCHeres a start to the time travel thing, I got him back and 
> set 
> > > up the
> > > > conflict, now you can control him for the battle then I'll 
> bring 
> > > him back to
> > > > the future to continue the story.
> > > > 
> > > > BIC Megaton flew across the Atlantic much like the Pilgrims 
> will 
> > > one day do.
> > > > He lands on the shore and devises a plan to delete his 
> > Predacessor 
> > > Megatron.
> > > > Two units with the tyrants personality were two to many but 
> > > according to the
> > > > mutants math there was only one to destroy. transforming to 
his 
> > > freakish
> > > > robot mode from his dragon form cut his size by four. he 
> scanned 
> > > the area
> > > > and found a hidden cave nearby. He needed rest and the cave 
> would 
> > > offer
> > > > enough concealment.
> > > > 
> > > > Once inside the mutant found the cave paintings from a 
youth,  
> > from 
> > > what he
> > > > could tell the youth was human, a tribe of the useless 
fleshy, 
> > weak
> > > > creatures must have migrated away and left only thier 
paintings 
> > to 
> > > show they
> > > > were ever there.
> > > > 
> > > > Megaton reached out and touched the wall, a sudden charge of 
> > energy 
> > > forced
> > > > the large bot away from the wall. He held up his hand and 
> scanned 
> > > it for an
> > > > energy signature only to find nothing had happened to him. 
The 
> > > scanns did
> > > > reveal one oddity though. A thin layer of berries, sap, and 
mud 
> > had 
> > > coated
> > > > his fingers. The wall paintings were wet like they were drawn 
> an 
> > > hour ago
> > > > instead of  years past.
> > > > 
> > > > The mutant exited the cave ansd scanned the world. two pods 
> > weren't 
> > > far
> > > > away. The beast transformed to his T-Rex form and went to 
> > > investigate. once
> > > > nearby he detected animals, three of them. from the looks of 
> > things 
> > > there
> > > > was a mother, father and baby. A mighty swing of the monsters 
> > tail 
> > > remedied
> > > > the family situation killing the mother (leaving the baby and 
> > > fathers DNA to
> > > > be replicated.) After the two creatures ran away he continued 
> to 
> > > the pod
> > > > where he saw Stallex and Mustex, they weren't bots he 
> recognized.
> > > >
